TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Talamakau, title = Talamakau, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Talamakau} }

S.FORM: Talamakau i Pingtung a kuwan nu Kalinku ku niyazu' nu Talamakau. u kasalumaluma' nu Talamakau sa, 229 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 757 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 718 ku tademaw, pakalatu 95%. u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 39 ku tademaw, pakalatu 5%. u kasabinacadan, Rukai 85%, Paiwan 5%, Bunun 1%, Amis 2%, zumazuma 2%.

Talamakao i Pingtong a kowan no Kalinko ko niyazo' no Talamakao. o kasalomaloma' no Talamakao sa, 229 ko loma'. komod no kasabinawlan sa, 757 ko tademawan. kasabinawlan no Ingcomin sa, 718 ko tademaw, pakalato 95%. o zoma sa, cay ko Ingcomin, 39 ko tademaw, pakalato 5%. o kasabinacadan, Rokai 85%, Paiwan 5%, Bonon 1%, Amis 2%, zomazoma 2%.
